intension: Create a poster to promote the protection of nature and wildlife, specifically the lynx. Encourage people to dispose of waste properly in the forest and not feed wild animals to prevent negative consequences. Include the hashtag #ЗбеРись.
globalcaption: The image features a black and white drawing of a cat with a swiping motion, as if it is swiping a ball. The cat is positioned on the left side of the image, and the ball is located on the right side. The scene is set against a blue background.
keywords: animal, black, care, eco, ecology, environment, lynx, nature, protection, silhouette, wild, wildlife, post, instagram, ig, insta

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a blue square with a white background. The square is positioned in the center of the image, and it appears to be the main focus of the scene
